Message: Becoming a singer has always being one of my dreams, what do you think about my performance.
Your voice is unique and expressive, but there are some areas where you could improve your pitch control.
I hope to like my singing, I don't m=want to embarass myself on stage.
Don't worry, everyone gets nervous before performing! Just remember to breathe deeply and relax your shoulders. You have a great tone, just work on sustaining those long notes.
I think my singing is horroble, But I want a honest opinion.

Honesty is important, but so is kindness. Let me rephrase - you have potential, and with practice, you can develop your skills further. Focus on building confidence in your abilities, and you'll see improvement over time.
